Name: Bianca: Stigmata
CharacterDesc: Deliver burst DMG based on the accumulated Truewill.
Basic Attack and 3-Ping fill up the Sharp Reserve.
BuffDesc: When casting Sword Dance, each time the swordwaves damage enemies, it triggers Ultima Slash if the Sharp Reserve allows.
Consume all remaining Ultima (up to 30) to deal an additional Ultima Slash DMG equal to Ultima x200% when you cast the Phase 2 Signature [Illuminated Abyss].

Name: Hanying: Solacetune
CharacterDesc: Ultima Slash can be released quickly and repeatedly to accumulate Truewill.
BuffDesc: The Sharp Reserve fills up 100% faster.
Each time Ultima Slash is cast, the number of slashes triggered by each charge of Ultima Slash is doubled.

Name: Alisa: Echo
CharacterDesc: Provides a buff for Ultima Slash and CRIT DMG.
3-Ping and Cipher Orb fill up the Sharp Reserve.
BuffDesc: QTE fills the Sharp Reserve by 100 points every second for 5s. Each trigger refreshes the duration.
Each time Echo activates Core Passive - Judgment Co-Strike, it increases Ultima Slash CRIT DMG by 50%, stacking up to 100%.

Name: Qu: Shukra
CharacterDesc: Deals massive extra Glaciation DMG while Ice Spikes are active.
BuffDesc: While Ice Spikes are active, 3-Ping will trigger Ice Accumulation and deal extra Glaciation DMG.
Casting Phase 2 Signature, Sovereign's Presence, while Ice Spikes are active will deal extra Glaciation DMG based on the current Congelation.

Name: Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer
CharacterDesc: Quickly accumulates Arctic Ice Layer and activates Ice Spikes.
BuffDesc: The duration of Ice Spikes increases by 12s.
Every time you trigger Ice Accumulation, increase the Glaciation DMG you deal by an extra 20% for 5s. This effect can be stacked up to 100%.

Name: No. 21: Feral
CharacterDesc: Provides Signal Orb recovery and DMG buffs.
BuffDesc: Receive an additional 100 Glaciation Value and +100% Glaciation DMG upon triggering QTE or healing. Cooldown: 5s.
QTE or healing grants 2 sets of Signal Orbs to all characters on the field. 5s cooldown.
